content:
From: webmaster@hl7.org
A new project proposal is available for your review - CARIN IG for BlueButtonÂ® Eligibility Card. The project proposal process is intended to allow Work Groups to register their desire or intent to work on a project and to engage interested parties at an earlier stage than the Project Scope Statement (PSS). Some goals of this process are to help identify appropriate sponsors, cosponsors, or interested parties; eliminate redundancies; and promote community awareness of what work is coming in to HL7. Once the review period is complete and any comments are reconciled, the identified sponsoring WG may proceed to the creation and approval of a full Project Scope Statement.

You are invited to review the following project proposal at https://jira.hl7.org/browse/PSS-1671 and provide comments. Instructions for how to review a project proposal are available here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/HL7/How+to+Create+and+Review+a+Project+Proposal
Currently HL7.org logins are not currently working. We are investigating and will update when resolved. Thank you for your patience!
Logins are working again. Please close your browser before attempting to login again. If you have any questions, please let me know!
